Cc SANYS) 
(USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Epstein FOIA - OCME Report of Autopsy 
(USANYS 
OCME asked whether we could send them a copy of the redacted autopsy report. Could you please send me a copy of it 
on Friday so I can forward to them? Thank you! 
Sent: lippg.2021 6:46 Pm 
Sent: (USANYS)
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: USANYS) 
(US 
Subject: RE: Epstein FOIA - OCME Report of Autopsy 
Thanks, Yes, we will ask BOP to redact that photo as well. 
From (USANYS) 
Sent: Tuesda June 29, 2021 3:45 PM 
To (USANYS 
Cc: USANYS) 
(USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Epstein FOIA - OCME Report of Autopsy 
Eind 
USANYS) 
USANYS) 
I spoke with the GC of OCME, who appreciated the head's up. One note for you all: the photo of the hyoid bone on page 
12 is in fact Epstein's hyoid bone. To the extent we're redacting the closeup photos from page 13, shouldn't we also 
redact the entire photo on page 12? 
EFTA00010417

Thanks, 
From: SUSANYS)1111 
Sent: Monday, June 28, 2021 5:02 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc USANYS) (USANYS) 
(U 
Subject: pstein -Report of Autopsy 
Please find attached the OCME Report of Autopsy. The boxes show where there will be redactions. 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
300 Quarropas Street 
White Plains, NY 10601 
EFTA00010418
